title: Vigil on wheels
creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India, M. Bhavnani and V.R. Sarma
brief_description: Portrays the job done by railway men in providing safety for passengers who speed across India day and night. Shows the maintenance of locomotives and carriages, and the frequent checking to which they are subject to ensure proper functioning.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Division, Government of India, M. Bhavnani and V.R. Sarma
